content.detailedDescription:
////first\\\\\\all has happened within one mile of my home and i rember them well ....Hovering light went right by my grandfathers house ,over the top of under ground storm pitt down the side of a hillwitch his house is on ,into the side of another hill ...I was so scared that i did not go down there untill i was about 16 years old ....There was and i think might still be a dent in the ground there ...This was seen by myself and  my granfather ..He is not with us anymore/////second\\\\\we where all having sunday dinner at my aunts trailer ,witch was about 150 ft from my granfathers house ...We all got through eating ,,and my grandmother forgot and left the pies in the house ,so she went to get it ...She came back in and said come see to everyone and we all went outside and it looked a car lot in the sky all white lights ,,, well as we where watching we noticed that the lights where all going to one center light one at a time and the center light was changing colors as they all went in ,,,then it streaked straight up and outa sight.../////three\\\\\\\i have within the last five years seen two triangler obgects with four white lights on each line down each side back line not lite..One hovered i say hovered it was moving about 4or 5 miles and hour and flu straight over or heads i could hit it with a rock ...All there was ,was a hum as it went over..///////four\\\\\\\
same triangular light but was the second time i seen it ...It was just like it was hanging in the sky over me about 500 ft or better ..The bottom of it stayed facing me the hole time ,,,and it slowly went outa sight and made turn like you turn a knob one turn all the way around and was gone,,,no sound it all ...///////five\\\\\\\\also i see thing that looks like stars ..That goes from 45 deg. to 45 deg. in the sky in about 30 seconds ,,they dont blink just looks like a moving star ....See them anytime i look up ....Yea i know all this is funny ,,,but put me on a lie detector ,,,if i fail ill check myself in....
content.summary: There has been several events since i was a kid upto current..

content.detailedDescription: We were outside by a campfire and watching the stars. it looked like a falling star but was much larger and bright red- it also left a fuzzy trail. the event left us mystified- we lost sight when it fell.
content.summary: A huge, bright reddish orb zoomed across the sky at the speed of light and left a blurry trail.

content.detailedDescription: Tonight i walked out onto my porch to see if i could see anymore of the blinking lights in the sky and i saw two!!! they were both parallel to each other about 35-40 degrees from the horizon in the north western sky. they stayed stationary for about 10 minutes and then alternated on one rising and the other lowering below the rooftops. they danced like that for about 35 minutes before both lowering below the rooftops to where i could not see them. they both blinked red, white, green, and blue. red and blue seeming to be the most used. the one on the left would blink through the colors quickly while the one on the left blinked a little bit slower. after i saw the objects the temperature around me got a lot warmer and i started to sweat.  not too happy about that part of it. i also couldnt get video or photos as i only have a camera phone and it wont pick them up at all... i invite anyone out here to see them on a clear night though!!!!
content.summary: Two starlike blinking objects dancing in nw sky

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a cigarette before bed and noticed a bright object in the nw sky. what struck me immediately were 2 things, the color of the object, and the fact that it was stationary. it was easily 2 times the brightness of any other star or planet, and a pale orange color. initially i suspected it to be an overhead satellite but the object was not moving. it was also too high to be a hovering helicopter. i watched it for perhaps 30 seconds, and then the object faded. it became as bright as one of the surrounding stars and then blinked out of existence from the naked eye.
content.summary: Observed bright orange stationary orb in nw sky from sw calgary., brighter than any other object in the night sky. it dimmed slowly and disappered from sight.

content.detailedDescription:
Out on a boat on twin lakes. object appeared in the southwest shortly after dark. was proceeding at a fast pace north west at constant speed.  unknown altitude, completely silent (initially thought it was a meteor skimming the atmosphere, or space junk burning up). object traveled overhead, proceeded north east, until it slowly dimmed and finally vanished.  when overhead, the color was orange/red, as the light from a flame. it seemed to have a brighter part and a more faint part.

about 5-10 minutes after the object vanished, in the direction last seen a similarly colored object rose up from the horizon in a diagonal, straight climbing flight path.  it then stopped, then begin to move back toward us (it would have been traveling southeast).  after a few seconds, it vanished.

after another 10 minutes, a second object appeared following a similar slight path as the first (appearing in the southwest and traveling to the same spot north east.  it seemed to possibly change shape.  again, it vanished in about the same spot as the first.

the color of the object was a gentle orange/red. no blinking, noise, or exterior lights of any kind.  impossible to estimate the height, except that it was above the clouds.  she of the glowing light was circular--i cannot say if it was a dome, sphere, disk, or the lighted portion of a different craft.

if i had not seen the later phenomenon, i would have considered this a meteor glowing in the upper atmosphere.
content.summary: 2-3 glowing red lights in sky, moving north east.

content.detailedDescription:

about 5-10 minutes after the object vanished, in the direction last seen a similarly colored object rose up from the horizon in a diagonal, straight climbing flight path.  it then stopped, then begin to move back toward us (it would have been traveling southeast).  after a few seconds, it vanished.

after another 10 minutes, a second object appeared following a similar slight path as the first (appearing in the southwest and traveling to the same spot north east.  it seemed to possibly change shape.  again, it vanished in about the same spot as the first.

the color of the object was a gentle orange/red. no blinking, noise, or exterior lights of any kind.  impossible to estimate the height, except that it was above the clouds.  she of the glowing light was circular--i cannot say if it was a dome, sphere, disk, or the lighted portion of a different craft.

if i had not seen the later phenomenon, i would have considered this a meteor glowing in the upper atmosphere.
content.summary: 2-3 glowing red lights in sky, moving north east.

content.detailedDescription:
On aug 12, 2010, i went out about 2:30 am to watch the perseids meteor shower.

i was by milton 3 ponds in milton, nh, i was looking at the bottom right star in the little dipper, when i saw a extremely bright flash at first i thought i saw a star burn out, when my eyes adjusted i noticed that the star was still there but now it was moving from left to right.

my next thought was well it is just a satellite or maybe the space station, just then it stopped, it stayed stationary for about 5-6 seconds and then it started moving again but in a different direction, it now was heading toward the lake it made a large ark out and around the lake and right back to the place where i first spotted it.

the next night aug 13, 2010, my neighbor that i told what i had seen the night before ask me if i would go back to the lake and take him this time, and i did, well we were not there 10 minutes when the same object appeared again roughly in the same spot i had seen it the night before. about 5-6 minutes later my friend pointed out a really bright light in the western sky just above the tree line, we watched this bright light for a good half an hour, during this time we watched this light change from red to green to blue and also white.

this light also would appear to just blink out completely for 3-4 seconds and then appear again but several feet in the sky to its left and our right, it also looked like it was moving up and down left and right and even at times in small circles this light disappeared 5 times 4 of the 5 it would re-appear but each time it came back it was a little more to its left, the 5th time it went out it did not come back.

we had no clue what we were looking at and jokingly i said to my friend what would you do if it disappeared and all of a sudden it was right above us, as i finished saying that i kind of jumped and said holly sh*t that just scared the sh*t out of me, my friend quickly looked in my direction and said what?, and i replied oh that plane coming across the lake with its landing lights on, we kind of laughed but kept watching the plane, as it got closer it started looking more and more not like a plane, my friend asked is there an airport close by and i said no why? and he said then why would it be so low and have its landing lights on? well this got us both really watching these 2 lights that i thought at first was a plane with its landing lights on, it was getting closer and we still didn`t hear any noise.

as it got closer we could see it better it had 2 large flood lights in the front but we didn`t see the standard red and green blinking lights on the wings, and no wings and still didn`t hear any sound from it we were sitting in the car with the sunroof open, and the craft was coming right at us from my left across the lake. it flew just about right over us, as it got right above us it was about 3-400 feet up and it flew through a small cloud as it got right above us that was when we heard a very low like rumbling sound nothing like a plane at all, but when it entered the cloud those huge spot lights in the front lit up the whole cloud and it illuminated the whole craft in like a golden aura, that was when the 2 of us really got a good look at it and i can say it scared the hell out of us both!! it looked like a large triangle, the first thing my friend said was holy sh*t look at that it looks like a pyramid flying over us!! it had the 2 large lights in the front and one large intense strobe in the back there were no other standard lights at all on this thing! what i saw was what looked like a pyramid sitting on top of this black triangle i also saw well the only way i can describe it as a half of an arch going from half way from the rear point of the triangle from the front arching up to this pyramid shape that was on top of the triangle.

on the inside of this arch looking part on the pyramid part it looked like either a row of six windows that were illuminated from inside with a golden light or maybe it was just a row of 6 golden lights. it wasn`t moving very fast at all, maybe like 40-50 mph because we got a good look, as it went over us for i would say maybe 4-5 seconds. on the right side of the road, is a row of pine trees as it went over these trees, i jumped out of the car and ran to the other side of the road just past the row of trees is a swampy area roughly a quarter of a mile across then you hit the rest of the woods.

it looked to us like it had dropped even lower when it passed the first row of trees to where i thought it was either going to land or crash into this swampy area, but when i got to the tree line i could see this thing start to move back up and over the wooded area on the other side of the swamp, and it seemed to just blink out of sight.

i have never seen anything like this in my life, and i have seen a lot of different aircraft, i am a navy vet that served during the gulf war.

i have been trying to draw what i saw but i am not a very good artist, after we got back in the car i realized my new cell phone had a camera and does take video i am really kicking myself in the butt for not thinking of using the phone to either video it or at least get a few snap shots of this thing!(this was reported to nufroc 2 days after the sighting i just found your sight and thought you should hear about this too if you didn't already know about this report)
content.summary: Looked  like a pyramid sitting on top of a black triangle

content.detailedDescription: I just saw three star like lights in the sky that are flashing different colors and staying in place. i am located in olathe, ks and can clearly see then about north-east and are very visible.
content.summary: Three flashing star like objects

content.detailedDescription: 8 circles at the bottom a littile heavy
content.summary: Circle

content.detailedDescription: 8 circles at the bottom a littile heavy
content.summary: Circle

content.detailedDescription: 5 -27-12 at about 10:10 pm sun down sky was just beginning to get dark. to the south of my location. from my position they seemed to be just over the houses i think they may have been a half mile or more away one higher than the other.  at first they seemed to be either slowly moving toward my location or slowly climbing up. they seemed to float there for a short time thought at first they could be balloons with flares attached.  the higher one would begin to go higher and the lower one would follow. they began to climb faster the highest one went straight up accelerating out of sight the lower one followed but continued to climb in a northerly direction i did not lose sight of the second one until it was overhead and to the north seemed to be at a very high altitude by this time and moving at a very hi rate of speed did not hear any sound.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Two witnesses spotted two orange lights

content.detailedDescription: 5 -27-12 at about 10:10 pm sun down sky was just beginning to get dark. to the south of my location. from my position they seemed to be just over the houses i think they may have been a half mile or more away one higher than the other.  at first they seemed to be either slowly moving toward my location or slowly climbing up. they seemed to float there for a short time thought at first they could be balloons with flares attached.  the higher one would begin to go higher and the lower one would follow. they began to climb faster the highest one went straight up accelerating out of sight the lower one followed but continued to climb in a northerly direction i did not lose sight of the second one until it was overhead and to the north seemed to be at a very high altitude by this time and moving at a very hi rate of speed did not hear any sound.

content.summary: Two witnesses spotted two orange lights

content.detailedDescription: We were on my patio watching the storms looking west when i turn and looked south when i saw what i thought was a flare or firework but it didnt blow up. it was red and started comeing toward us,i thought maybe a baloon with a light on it but it was to windy and it would have been to crazy of a flight partern. we didnt know wtf it was it flew straight and level in that wind and when it got close just about above my garage i heald at it and the red light turned a little my way then back and went past us. when it passed us we didnt see the red light any more, it look like a gray ball. we watched it go out over the lake and over the park and lost it in the sky.
content.summary: Ball with only a red light that went from south to north over are heads.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were in our spa at approximately 9:45 pm when i noticed a bright light almost directly overhead. when i looked up, it was probably magnitude -6 or -7, and was just west of a line between the star alkaid in ursa major and arcturus in bootes. it seemed to move slightly east and then turned to the south, it hadn't traveled much more than 20 degrees before it had faded so much that i couldn't see it anymore. limiting magnitude that night was about +4.5, due to light pollution from topeka. my wife was facing the wrong direction to see it after it had faded, and didn't look up in time when it was bright.
content.summary: Extremely bright light directly overhead, changed direction and rapidly faded.

content.detailedDescription: It appear to be a falling star but then it dropped 4 balls f fire
content.summary: It appear to be a falling star but then it dropped 4 balls f fire

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i where riding on my motorcycle south on mopac expressway in austin, tx going to barton creek wilderness area.  my girlfriend motioned skyward with her right hand pointing at a brilliant cigar shaped blinding flash of light in the sky to our southwest, thirty degrees above the horizon at our two o'clock. i had noticed it before she pointed it out.  there were no clouds in the sky.  it was so bright it shown like a mirror reflecting light.  my girlfriend thought it was very bright and so did i. my girlfriend says she began to wonder when the object became dull so quickly.  the very next second it appeared cigar shaped and dull white like a commercial jet without wings or tail, like it was low flying, and it was moving to the right, then suddenly vanished.  there was no where for it to go, the sky was clear and blue, no clouds at all for it to hide behind.  startled, i pulled over to see if we could find where the object might have gone, but the sky was completely empty.  we both thought it was quite strange, we were both certain that we were looking directly at it when it disappeared, and we agreed we both saw it disappear while we were on my motorcycle, we were not looking away.

we compared our experience a half an hour later to a small commercial jet flying at a relatively low altitude.  the jet was easily identifiable as a jet and we could trace it with ease all the way across the sky.  our experience with the cigar shaped object was just the opposite.  we could not trace any object flying a path across the sky, it simply vanished.
content.summary: Cigar shape blinding white reflective flash then dull white cigar shape then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Four of my friends and i were sitting in a hot tub next to the lake in the town we live in. we had just gotten into the hot tub and were observing a very strange cloud formation. the clouds were very high and the crescent moon behind them were illuminating them. the clouds had formed the shape of a trojan soldiers profile. very similar to the trojan man condom logo. one of my friends who was sitting directly to my left started getting all worked up asking us if we saw it. thinking he was referring to the odd cloud formation i looked back into the sky and noticed three very faint lights, one green, one yellow, and one blue. as soon as i saw the lights another one of our friends started tracking it as well. they formed a triangle and were very faint. i would almost describe them as ultra-violet, similar to the light colored leds give off. the object could have been just inside of the cloud layer creating this effect. the lights were not blinking or pulsing, they just moved from the left hand side of the valley to the right at an incredible speed. traveling what seemed to be hundreds of miles in a matter of 20 to 30 seconds. when the lights had reached the most northern side of the lake they started to pulse, then disappeared. two of my friends had seen it, and the other two just stared at us thinking we were crazy as we were all very scared after seeing this.
content.summary: A triangle with a solid light on each corner crossed the entire sky rather quickly.

content.detailedDescription: We seen a red and white flashing orb in the south part of the sky about the size of a dime.  it was stationary for about 45 minutes to an hour and slowly fainted.
content.summary: We seen a red and white flashing orb about the size of a dime.

content.detailedDescription: Ottawa, chinatown/centertown. i saw three (3) flat black flying objects flying at a very high altitude (in relation to low cloud cover). the objects remained quite large (hot air balloon sized) at the observed altitude so i would assume they were quite large. they made no noise and were of a strange random looking geometry from what was silhouetted against the overcast sky. they flew slowly in a triangular pattern first north/south then banked gradually east/west and appeared to gain altitude until they faded from sight. i'm wondering if anyone from ottawa saw what i saw. i called down to a few people on the street (from my second floor preston balcony) but the houses obscured their view. did anyone see these objects maybe earlier in their flightpath when the sky was clearer and identification might have been easier given more light in the sky?
content.summary: 3 large asymmetrical pitch black objects flying oner chinatown ottawa early evening sunday

content.detailedDescription: Sitting on the front porch and over the tree line across the street we thought was a plane, but it stayed in one place hovering for about 3 min. it started bright and then the light got smaller and smaller.  it didn't shoot across the sky (we sit outside in the evenings and do see quite a few shooting stars) this object didn't do that.  it just hovered over the tree line. then disappeared.
content.summary: Bright light over stuarts draft va

content.summary: Bright light over stuarts draft va

content.detailedDescription: My cousin, her husband, and i where on the porch when my cousins husband noticed  three redish orange spheres ascending up and to the north east. at first we all thought it was an airpane in the distance. we went outside the screen to get a better look. once they reached a certain altitude they turned south east and disappeared. they where slow moving but faster than an airplane is in the sky. the lights did not blink like running lights on a normal aircraft. they had very smooth and precise movement. we counted fourteen lights total all moving the same way, same speed, close together with no sound.  approxamently five minutes after the sighting we heard the sound of a jet aircraft. we looked up and saw it traveling toward the same direction the unidentified crafts had disappeared five minutes earlier. the jet was traveling at a very fast rate of speed. the entire sighting with jet took about twenty minutes.
content.summary: Very uniformed close together no noise and all disappeared in same spot

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my brother and a friend talking and my friend and i saw a passing blue orb flying over our heads and then was seen again by my brother and my amigo.Depois we were talking and we saw a normal star, then she began to move from side to side and it was as if she went off her light and was red and it was as if he was cold and gray and darker with a ball in the middle like a cabin, and even at night you could see this object with claresa and then he grew up and eventually disappear.
here in sao luis - maranhao, brazil i've seen many ufos i think if someone would check for sure see them too ...
content.summary: I saw two orbs, and a ufo that looked like a star

content.detailedDescription:
On may 27, 2012 at around 10:00 p.M. near romeo, mi i was walking our dog outside the house and happened to look above house to see a large glowing orange light directly above house. the brightness fluxuated a bit. it was silently moving due north.  because there was no clouds it hard to judge altitude and size. it sort appeared to be about the size of the box that large shop vac would come in. 

our house is on a hill and we able to to track it until it completely disappeared over the northern horizon.  the duration of the event was about 3 minutes. i might have though that it was a floating luminairie except that the wind had been coming from the northwest to the southeast all day. this unit traveled due north almost as if following a road.  

two other people witnessed the event. it happened so fast that we had little time to to have any reaction except surprise.
content.summary: Orange glowing light moving in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Outside with 3 friends smoking (tobacco) and talking when i noticed what appeared to be a satellite passing overhead. we all concurred that it appeared to be a satellite. there were no blinking lights or any other color than white. it looked about the same size and intensity as the north star. it moved in a flat line trajectory east to west for roughly 2 minutes before making a 20 degree turn to the north. my friends and i found this very unusual for a satellite. shortly thereafter it disappeared for 20 seconds or so, and then reappeared doubling in intensity along the same flight path. 5 seconds later it disappeared again. within a minute or two me and my friends observed 2 very high flying aircraft along the same flight path. they were clearly aircraft with both stationary and blinking red lights and kept changing their flight path as if they were searching for something.
content.summary: Star like object moved overhead, disappeared and reappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Port charlotte, fl, may 27, 2012. i was taking my dogs out in the backyard to run around at approximately 8:15 p.M.  i glanced to the north and saw about nine orange-amber glowing balls in the distance rising from the treeline. they were in a scattered pattern but rising slowly and steadily.  i didn't know what to think, so i called my friend out.  he said they must be planes.  but i pointed out that they were awfully close together.  by that time, there must have been at least fifteen of them with still more rising/appearing.  as they would get to a certain point, they began veering to the east with the same smooth movement.  he said they must be helicopters and went back in the house. i began thinking, wow, there must really be some big problem/event, if there are that many helicopters in the sky.  i remained and waited to hear the familiar sound of the helicopter engines but heard nothing; i also noted that the orange color of the glow did not correspond to any helicopters or airplanes i have ever seen in the night sky.  to get to any airports in our vicinity, they would need to start moving southeast but they kept moving east and then just faded into the darkness.  they did not seem to be in any sort of formation, and more lights continued to rise in less numbers for a few more minutes.  they all followed the same easterly pathline and then faded away.  i checked a little while later, but there were no more lights.
content.summary: At least 15 orange-colored balls rose over the treetops in a scattered pattern and slowly headed east before faded into the darkness.

content.detailedDescription:
Myself along with my wife children and dad had moon light dinner in the open floor on top of my residence and was just relaxing and enjoying the night skies, all of a sudden i noticed two lights (like stars) falling from a higher altitude to a lower altitude, both approximately stop at the same altitude and appeared to move like a swimming fish for about a moment and then moved in a straight line from south-west to north-east.

since i was sleeping and gazing the sky, i was able to notice this immediately; i first thought it might be a airplane, but later i realized it was an odd object, i was curious and fascinated to watch the object, but unfortunately i was able to watch this only for about 5-6 secs due to physical obstacles around my residence.
content.summary: Two orange colored objects were flying in sync with each other towards north-east

content.detailedDescription: Londonkaleb is the person who owns this alien and is the person who has filmed the object on video in hd. watch the video for the details and decide for yourself.
content.summary: Alien captured & recovered from the sea
